query:
SELECT 
  v.id AS vendaId,
  v.dataVenda,
  v.valorTotal,
  v.updatedAt,
  v.updatedBy,
  f.nome AS formandoNome,
  t.codigo AS turmaCodigo,
  u.name AS usuarioNome,
  u.email AS usuarioEmail
FROM vendas v
LEFT JOIN formandos f ON v.formandoId = f.id
LEFT JOIN turmas t ON f.turmaId = t.id
LEFT JOIN users u ON v.updatedBy = u.id
WHERE t.codigo = 902 
  AND DATE(v.updatedAt) = CURDATE()
ORDER BY v.updatedAt DESC
LIMIT 20;
